articles.title: What is a heat dome? And why is it affecting millions? A visual explainer - USA TODAY
articles.description: Tens of millions of Americans across the south-central U.S. – many of them in Texas – have endured a brutal heat wave over the past two weeks.
articles.content: Tens of millions of Americans across the south and central U.S. many of them in Texas have endured a brutal heat wave over the past couple of weeks as temperatures soared to record levels, including … [+3109 chars]
